column1: Too much screen time can: - Make it hard for your child to sleep at night - Raise your child's risk of attention problems, anxiety, and depression - Raise your child's risk of gaining too much weight (obesity) Screen time increases your child's risk of obesity because: - Sitting and watching a screen is time that is not spent being physically active.
Cutting down to 2 hours a day can be hard for some children because TV may be such a large part of their daily routines.
- Suggest other activities, such as family board games, puzzles, or going for a walk.
